titleStmt.title: One trumpet more sounded out of Sion to the inhabitants of the earth which they may take as a warning for them to let Israel go and worship their God after their wonted manner, or else destruction will the Lord bring upon them eternally : and also a few words by way of expostulation with the spirit of Cain ... / given forth by ... John Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, John.
